div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 06:53 am MDT

div.div: Sunny, with a high near 71. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.
Clear, with a low around 38. North wind 10 to 15 mph becoming light and variable in the evening.
Sunny, with a high near 84. South wind 5 to 10 mph increasing to 10 to 15 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.

div.p:
Congratulations to Wauneta-Palisade's George Cordell Lee and Austen Rozelle for being recognized by the RPAC for excellence on the ACT. Lee was awarded a bronze medal and Rozelle a silver medal for their scores on this test.
ACT Recognition Honoree Medal Criteria:
--all students listed are in the 12th Grade
--award level is based on ACT composite score with the following levels:
Bronze . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about 2020 RPAC ACT Awards

div.p: Please read Wauneta-Palisade's update from April 2, 2020

Wauneta-Palisade Educational Continuity Plan
Last Modified March 31, 2020
Overview & Purpose
The mission of Wauneta-Palisade School is “Inspiring Our Youth and Expecting Results Every Day.” We will continue to do everything we can to carry out that mission and ensure that learning continues even in these unprecedented times and the event of long-term school building closure. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about WP Continuity of Education Plan

div.p: Breakfast and lunch will be available for students beginning March 23rd. Meals will be served in a "grab and go" format. In an effort to help kitchen staff prepare, we are asking families to please click the link a the bottom of the post and fill out the confidential form. This is not mandatory in order for your student to receive meals. More specific details will be released as they are available. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Meals Served During School Closure
